articles.title: We put Afrihost data on an MTN SIM and it was dead easy - MyBroadband
articles.description: MyBroadband tested a new Afrihost Air Mobile product, and signing up was a pleasure. South Africa’s mobile network operators could learn a thing or two from ISPs like Afrihost.
articles.content:
MyBroadband is busy testing the uncapped mobile data package by Afrihost, which runs on the MTN network, and was surprised by how easy it was to get working.
